column4: i also have another question, after installing this program...i cannot uninstall it...wine says "file c:\windowsDIIUnin.dat not found"
that path seems to be wrong
would you suggest another way to uninstall it?  should i just delete the folder in .wine?
oh i see, the path should be "C:\windows\DIIUnin.exe"  hmm, maybe i can change this in winecfg?
